Dear esteemed members of the jury,

I stand before you today as a testament to resilience and adaptability. Throughout this game, I've demonstrated my ability to form meaningful connections, navigate complex social dynamics, and make tough decisions. My opponent, while formidable, has shown a tendency to prioritize short-term gains over long-term relationships. I urge you to consider the value of loyalty and integrity, and to choose me as the winner of this game.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair in my interactions. I've formed genuine connections with many of you and always approached our conversations with honesty.

I've survived by building relationships rather than targeting others unnecessarily. When I had to vote, I made decisions based on game dynamics rather than personal vendettas.

I believe I've played a balanced game - strategic enough to reach the final two, but ethical in how I got here. I'd be honored to have your vote based on how I've conducted myself throughout this journey.
